entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Saint-Jérôme
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:24 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

Visibility: 5 km

Wind: ENE 6 km/h

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
